Introduction

Chloris was a four-member group under FAB Entertainment. They made their debut on November 22, 2017 with the only single "Friday Night". They presumably disbanded in 2020 due to inactivity since late 2019. In addition, Mijin and Seonwoo had become trainees under Deep Studio Entertainment.
